info.title: Global product code manager
info.description: Manages product codes like EAN, UPC and many more

prop.name: dbc
prop.description: The Redback retail database connection manager.

method.name: add
method.description: Add a new product code to this product.

parameter.name: $productCodeType
parameter.description: The product code type. It references to EAN, UPC and other code types as retrieved from the database.

parameter.name: $expirationTime
parameter.description: The duration of the code expiration time in the future. Leave empty if this information is not available. If empty, the expiration time will be set for the next 3-5 years.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure (the code already exists).

method.name: update

parameter.name: $expirationTime
parameter.description: The duration of the code expiration time in the future. Leave empty if this information is not available. If empty, the expiration time will be set for the next 3-5 years.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: remove

parameter.name: $productCodeType
parameter.description: The product code type to be removed.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: get
method.description: Get all product codes of the given global product.
method.returndescription: An array of code information, like code, type and product id.

method.name: getCodeTypes
method.description: Get all inventory product code types.
method.returndescription: An array of all product code types.

method.name: addCodeType
method.description: Add a new product code type.
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.
